评论详情: This beautiful cross came much larger than I expected and therefore won't fit right with the intended recipient. The back shows a considerable amount of "watermarks/stains" for lack of a better term, which was disappointing when receiving a new piece of jewelry. Aside from those minor details, it is a lovely piece, and the charm with the tiny mustard seed gives it a special touch, sending a special message and reminder. It also came with a simple yet pretty little roped bracelet with a wooden heart that has a flower and the word 'love' etched on it. Aside from my small setbacks, I highly recommend this necklace and am overall very happy with it. Hope this helps.
This necklace was bigger in size then I expected. Great quality and beautiful made. Strong chain too.
